If you do, retire all of your opponent's units, bind them face up, your opponent chooses three cards from his or her hand, discards two cards from among them, and rides one card from among them on (VC) as [Stand]. (Retire the vanguard, and if your opponent has no cards in his or her hand, he or she rides from the soul. If your opponent has no cards in his or her hand and soul, your opponent loses)
